content:
The bomberman ('#') is at (4, 9). The goal ('$') is at (1, 11). There are many wall breaks ('b') on the map. The strategy to win this game is to first locate the goal and then navigate the avatar towards it, breaking any necessary wall breaks. Since the goal is to the north-east, I will first try moving up.
Action: 5
I'm moving up, hoping to get closer to the goal.

The avatar is at (4,9), and the goal is at (1,11). The path seems to require breaking the wall at (1,11) by going up, left and up.
Action:5
I expect the avatar to move up.

Okay, I am at position (3,9). The goal is at (1,11). I need to go up and to the right to reach the goal.

Action: 5
I will try to move up, expecting to see the avatar move upwards.
